name: bold_signal
description: Vibrant card on dark gradient. Number top-left, navigation top-right, title bottom-left.
signature_elements: Bold colored card as focal point (orange, coral, or vibrant accent)
Navigation breadcrumbs with active/inactive opacity states
extra_css: .slide-number { font-family: var(--font-display); font-size: clamp(3rem, 8vw, 8rem); opacity: 0.15; position: absolute; top: var(--slide-padding); left: var(--slide-padding); } .accent-card { background: var(--card-bg); color: var(--text-on-card); border-radius: 16px; padding: clamp(1.5rem, 3vw, 3rem); }
